lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is categorized as a Contributing Property and was established in 2000.

lex.text: The 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument is near Frederick, Maryland in the district of the Monocacy National Battlefield.

lex.text: The 14th New Jersey Volunteer Infantry Monument is located in the Monocacy National Battlefield which nearest city is Frederick, Maryland.
